title: Pubmatic Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Pubmatic adapter

publisherId.description: An ID which identifies the publisher

adSlot.description: An ID which identifies the ad slot

pmzoneid.description: Comma separated zone id. Used im deal targeting & site section targeting. e.g drama,sport

dctr.description: Deals Custom Targeting, pipe separated key-value pairs e.g key1=V1,V2,V3|key2=v1|key3=v3,v5

wrapper.description: Specifies pubmatic openwrap configuration for a publisher

profile.description: An ID which identifies the openwrap profile of publisher

version.description: An ID which identifies version of the openwrap profile

items.description: A key with one or more values associated with it. These are used in buy-side segment targeting.
